topic.title: Accessibility
topic.shortdesc: WebHelp Responsive output is accessible for people with disabilities being compliant with Section 508 accessibility standard.

body.p: TODO: What is an accessible documentation. Maybe we can add some words here.
Generally speaking, the WebHelp Responsive output has two major parts: topic content and WebHelp Responsive related components(publication TOC, breadcrumb, menu).
While the WebHelp Responsive components are designed to respect the accessibility rules, to get an accessible topic content it is important to respect a some rules when you write DITA topics.
